org.apache.activemq.core.settings.impl

Class HierarchicalObjectRepository<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.settings.impl.HierarchicalObjectRepository<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HierarchicalRepository<T>

    public class HierarchicalObjectRepository<T>
extends Object
implements HierarchicalRepository<T>
    allows objects to be mapped against a regex pattern and held in order in a list
    Author:
    Andy Taylor, Tim Fox
